overview: Tushy is heating up your sex life with a little Spice. This series brings you ladies who like to vary it up in the bedroom. Featured cover girl Hazel Grace isn't getting the same benefits her boss gave to all his other personal assistants. How far does a working girl have to go to get comprehensive coverage? Scarlett Jones, Ember Snow, and Keira Croft all need anal to keep them satisfied.
title: Spice 2
